âœ¦ ADAD Trance - Challenge.description: Switching-focused scenario emphasizing rhythmic ADAD strafes. Encourages controlled micro-corrections and pacing.
âœ¦ ADAD Trance - Challenge.notes: Keep cadence steady; avoid overflicking; focus on micro-correction after initial snap.

Dynamic Micro Hell - Challenge.description: Micro-correction heavy scenario with high target volatility; punishes overshoot and latency in adjustment.
Dynamic Micro Hell - Challenge.notes: Short, precise corrections; stabilize wrist; shoot on settle, not on swing.

VT 1w3ts Intermediate S5 - Challenge.description: Static target switching (1 wall, 3 targets). Emphasizes click timing, switch discipline, and minimal overflick.
VT 1w3ts Intermediate S5 - Challenge.notes: Anticipate target path; lead subtly; avoid over-snapping on switches.
